pr_title: Add support for associated link name, session id, and clean up ManagementNode

timeline.bodyText: Another error case : Where user pass in a session id which is not equal to current active session id.
timeline.author: hemanttanwar

replies.bodyText: This is done on the management channel. If another application passes you this id, you can complete it as long as someone is renewing that lock. the .NET code doesn't check that the session is not lost.
replies.author: conniey

replies.bodyText: If this is done on the actual receive link, then it checks to see if it is not lost.
replies.author: conniey

timeline.message: Cleaning up ManagementNode interface. Adding session and associated link.
Fixing bug where correct management node not returned.
Move single call ManagementChannel method back into parent method.
Adding logging and test case for peaked messages.
